1.content:
So to start us off i'll give you two choices:

1. A pre-established storyline: Follow a pre-made, pre-thought out storyline with multiple choice paths or make your own.

2. Something more free-from. Pick a character from the pet avengers or the wider marvel universe and just go ham, do whatever you feel like doing. X3 plot be damned.
1.title: Starting off

choices: The pet avengers and the Raccoon - Anyonarex
Dex-starr kills the pet avengers - Anyonarex
In the belly of the beast - Anyonarex
I want to make my own
11.content:
Alright to start us off, I'll do several story lines of my own:

Story one: The pet avengers and the raccoon - The pet avengers have a very memorable encounter with Rocket raccoon which begins a long and lasting friendship, of sorts. Until the Raccoon decides to make better use of the avengers as belly fodder, than companions.

Story two: a pet avenger unleashed - the often maligned supercat Hairball decides to strike out on his own. But first he'll need to get rid of some, or all, of his teammates in the best way a cat can. X3 if they won't show him respect, he'll make sure they pay...

Story three: Dex-starr kills the pet avengers - DC's very own super powered animal, the red lantern kitty Dex-starr, finds himself in the marvel universe. And he's none too pleased or impressed at what he finds there. A team of soft, innocent super animals, they fill him with such rage. There's only one solution to that...

Story four: In the belly of the beast - An alternate ending to issue #3 of the original series, which saw the pets end up in the belly of the giant whale Monstro. But this time, they will not escape.
11.title: A pre-established plot

111.content:
Urappppp

The heavy air of the bitter, beer scented belch wafted upwards and stayed in the air for a moment, then another, before finally dissipating for good. The raccoon in question clucking his teeth in apparent boredom, staring out at the dots of stars around him.

“Ze zame boring Zaturday, Comrade?”

Rocket gave the dog beside him a weary, withering look, then took another swig of his beer. He could never tell if Cosmo was making fun of him, sarcasm didn’t translate well through the telepathic cloud they communicated through.

“Zeems Zat Zay” He chuckled, mocking the dog’s thick Russian accent to an eye roll from the canine “Apparently the infinity stones are back in action, so maybe that’s something to check out.”

“Already found, comrade Rocket” Responded Cosmo, scratching a little at the fishbowl helmet around his neck “by a new team....”

Rocket looked at him, then back at the computer panel as several pets flashed on the screen. Some familiar, some not.

He raised an eyebrow. Looking at the cat, the dragon, the dogs, the tiger, the falcon and the oversized frog on the panels before him. And before he could stop it, his belly gave a low rumble. Rocket ignored it, for now.

As a matter of fact, it was hard for Cosmo to figure out how the raccoon felt about this at all...
111.title: The pet avengers and the Raccoon - Anyonarex

12.content: And who will this more free-form plot focus upon?
12.title: Something more free-form

15.content: Perhaps Hairball, or Maybe Ms lion? Or perhaps someone completely different....
15.title: One of the other members

info.brief_description: An adult interactive story based off and starring Marvel's furriest team, the pet avengers
info.description:
https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Pet_Avengers_(Earth-97161)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pB4_frN475E

Take Marvel's furriest super team and have them eat, be eaten, fuck, get fucked, become fat, get fat. X3 Whatever suits you. So long as it stars any of the characters:

Hairball (Niels) - The bouncing cat, gifted with kinetic powers similar to his owner Speedball.

Lockheed - Alien Dragon, loyal friend of Kitty Pryde, and a member of both the X-Men.

Lockjaw - The Inhuman Royal Family's teleporting canine.

Ms. Lion - Spider-Man's Aunt May's dimwitted but sweet pet dog with no superpowers.

Redwing - Noble bird partner of Falcon.

Throg (Puddlegulp) - Once human now frog imbued with the Asgardian powers of Thor granted to him by a sliver of Mjolnir, named Frogjolnir.

Zabu - Faithful Sabre-tooth companion of Ka-Zar from the Savage Land.
info.pretty_title: Lockjaw and the Pet Avengers Vore/WG/sex
